titleStmt.title: The new starre of the north, shining vpon the victorious King of Suueden
titleStmt.author: Gill, Alexander, 1597-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Augustine Matheuues for Robert Milbourne, and are to be sold at the signe of the Greyhound in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Alexander Gill by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Includes portrait of Gustavus II Adolphus.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Greyhound in Pauls Church-yard
